Consistently rated as excellent by 225-60r18 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 225/60R18 Tire Size Thanks to their larger diameter, 225/60R18 tires are often used on many of today’s most popular CUVs and SUVs such as the BMW X3, Chevrolet Equinox, Ford Escape, Toyota RAV4, Nissan Rogue, and Subaru Outback, in addition to performance-oriented cars like the Chrysler 300 and Dodge Charger . These vehicles continue to increase in popularity each year, and a brand new one might roll out of the factory with a set of Pirelli Cinturato P7 All Season, Michelin Primacy Tour A/S, Dunlop Grandtrek ST30, [Bridgestone Dueler H/P Sport AS](https://simpletire.com/brands/bridgestone-tires/dueler-h-p-sport-as), Continental ContiProConact, or Goodyear Assurance Comfortred tires attached. Popular vehicles: 2018-2021 BMW X3
2018-2021 Chevrolet Equinox
2005-2021 Chrysler 300
2006-2010, 2014, and 2018-2020 Dodge Charger
2020-2021 Ford Escape
2014-2020 Nissan Rogue
2019-2021 Toyota RAV4
2015-2021 Subaru Outback If you’re looking for a new set of 225/60R18 all-season tires for your car, CUV, or SUV that aren’t original equipment, check out the Bridgestone Dueler H/L Alenza, [Firestone Destination LE3](https://simpletire.com/brands/firestone-tires/destination-le3), Hankook Ventus S1 Noble2 (H452), or Kumho Solus TA71. Each tire provides drivers with strong traction and performance in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions. Taking a CUV or SUV off-road is a growing trend in the industry, and many manufacturers are starting to create all-terrain tires in 225/60R18 to give these drivers strong traction and performance on- and off-road. Check out best-in-class all-terrain tires like the Toyo Open Country A/T III, [Falken Wildpeak A/T Trail](https://simpletire.com/brands/falken-tires/wildpeak-a-t-trail), or the Yokohama Geolandar AT G015. Maybe you want a more performance-oriented tire for your Dodge Charger or luxury SUV. If that’s the case, consider ultra-high-performance tires like the [Michelin Pilot Sport 4 SUV](https://simpletire.com/brands/michelin-tires/pilot-sport-4-suv), General G-Max Justice, Pirelli P Zero All Season Plus, or Nexen N5000 Plus for sporty traction and handling in warmer weather. Whether you drive a Toyota RAV4, Subaru Outback, Dodge Charger, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 225/60R18 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
